thread.title: Lamar Odom spent 75,000 U.S. dollars on prostitutes in Las Vegas
thread.title_full: Lamar Odom spent 75,000 U.S. dollars on prostitutes in Las Vegas

title: Lamar Odom spent 75,000 U.S. dollars on prostitutes in Las Vegas
text:
Lamar Odom spent 75,000 U.S. dollars on prostitutes in Las Vegas By ANI | Posted 4 hours 
Melbourne: Lamar Odom, who is in coma after suffering drug overdose, spent 75,000 dollars on two prostitutes during the three-day sex and drugs binge in Las Vegas. 
Lamar Odom and Khloe Kardashian. Pic/ AFP 
The owner of the brothel, where the 35-year-old former NBA star was found unconscious, said that Odom had planned on more than a week of around-the-clock debauchery and he gave the girls 75,000 dollars for five days, reports News.com.au. 
Khloe Kardashian's former partner, who is still her husband legally, was admitted to Sunrise Hospital in Las Vegas after he was found unconscious. Tags:
